info.name: Phat Dat Real Estate Development Corporation
info.description: Phat Dat Real Estate Development Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the construction and trading of real estate properties. The company undertakes civil and industrial projects, bridges, and road works; and provides real estate brokerage and valuation services, as well as real estate management services. It also constructs houses of various kinds, and specialized and public works; offers real estate trading and brokerage services; trades in land use rights of owners, users, and lessees; and trades in construction materials and other equipment. Phat Dat Real Estate Development Corporation was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
